pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:5.1: 60. The training rule on what is growing on the thigh
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:6.2: At that time a nun, being alone with a man, had an abscess growing on her thigh ruptured.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:6.3: Then that man tried to rape that nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:6.5: The nuns came rushing to and asked her why.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.1: And she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.3: “How could a nun, being alone with a man, get an abscess growing on her thigh ruptured?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.7: How can a nun, being alone with a man, get an abscess growing on her thigh ruptured?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:8.1: ‘If a nun, alone with a man, without asking permission from the Order or a group, gets an abscess or a wound situated on her thigh ruptured or split open or washed or anointed or bandaged or unwrapped, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:10.2: below the navel and above the knees.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:10.12: the Order of nuns is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:10.14: several nuns is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:10.16: a human male, not a male spirit, not a male ghost, not a male animal, one who understands and is capable of raping.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:10.20: just the man and the nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.1: If she says, “Rupture it,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.2: When it has been ruptured, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.3: If she says, “Split it open,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.4: When it has been split open, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.5: If she says, “Wash it,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.6: When it has been washed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.7: If she says, “Anoint it,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.8: When it has been anointed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.9: If she says, “Bandage it,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.10: When it has been bandaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.11: If she says, “Unwrap it,” she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:11.12: When it has been unwrapped, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:12.2: if she asks for permission and then gets it ruptured or split open or washed or anointed or bandaged or unwrapped;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:12.3: if she has a female companion who understands;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:12.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:13.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc60:13.2: The sixth chapter on monasteries is finished.
